title: NSO Group vows to investigate potential spyware abuse following Pegasus Project investigation
content:
1. NSO Group vows to investigate potential spyware abuse following Pegasus Project investigation  The Washington Post
  2. Washington Post: Investigation finds Israeli-designed spyware was used to hack journalists and activists around the world  CNN
  3. Phones of Indian politicians, journalists hacked using Pegasus| Govt denies claim | Oneindia News  Oneindia News
  4. Washington Post report neglected spyware firm's Democratic connections in hacking investigation  Fox News
  5. Invisible surveillance: How spyware is secretly hacking smartphones  Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
